languages.text: "Я... не помню?... Так странно, словно я и тут, и там одновременно... Хотя... я помню, много вахт назад, визит гвардейца, как будто после нападения болотных дьяволов. Он обработал мои раны... сделал что-то с лицом... и сказал, когда придут его товарищи, сделать то, что они потребуют. И когда остальные пришли, они потребовали, чтобы я показал путь к гнезду... но мы же на корабле... куда я их повел".

traits.locale_text: "Я... не помню?... Так странно, словно я и тут, и там одновременно... Хотя... я помню, много вахт назад, визит гвардейца, как будто после нападения болотных дьяволов. Он обработал мои раны... сделал что-то с лицом... и сказал, когда придут его товарищи, сделать то, что они потребуют. И когда остальные пришли, они потребовали, чтобы я показал путь к гнезду... но мы же на корабле... куда я их повел".

languages.text: "I... don't remember? It's so strange... It's like I'm here and I'm there at the same time... But... I remember, many watches ago, a visit from a Guardsman, after the swamp devils attacked, it seemed. He treated my injuries... did something to my face... and said that his comrades would come and do what they had to do. And when the rest of them came, they told me to show them the way to the nest... but we're on the ship... where did I take them?"
languages.original_text: "Я... не помню?... Так странно, словно я и тут, и там одновременно... Хотя... я помню, много вахт назад, визит гвардейца, как будто после нападения болотных дьяволов. Он обработал мои раны... сделал что-то с лицом... и сказал, когда придут его товарищи, сделать то, что они потребуют. И когда остальные пришли, они потребовали, чтобы я показал путь к гнезду... но мы же на корабле... куда я их повел".

I remember, many watches ago, a visit from a Guardsman, after the swamp devils attacked, it seemed. He treated my injuries... did something to my face... and said that his comrades would come and do what they had to do. And when the rest of them came, they told me to show them the way to the nest... but we're on the ship... where did I take them?"

languages.text: 「わ…わかりません。とにかく奇妙で…まるで現実と幻覚を同時に見ているような感覚なのです…でも…しばらく前、沼の悪魔たちが襲ってきた後、ガーズマンが尋ねてきたのを覚えています。彼は私の怪我を治し…顔に何かをして…近いうちに仲間がきて、やるべきことを成すと言いました。そして仲間がきたら、敵の巣へと案内しろと…でも、ここは船の上ですよね…私は彼らをどこに案内したのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "I... don't remember? It's so strange... It's like I'm here and I'm there at the same time... But... I remember, many watches ago, a visit from a Guardsman, after the swamp devils attacked, it seemed. He treated my injuries... did something to my face... and said that his comrades would come and do what they had to do. And when the rest of them came, they told me to show them the way to the nest... but we're on the ship... where did I take them?"

traits.locale_text: 「わ…わかりません。とにかく奇妙で…まるで現実と幻覚を同時に見ているような感覚なのです…でも…しばらく前、沼の悪魔たちが襲ってきた後、ガーズマンが尋ねてきたのを覚えています。彼は私の怪我を治し…顔に何かをして…近いうちに仲間がきて、やるべきことを成すと言いました。そして仲間がきたら、敵の巣へと案内しろと…でも、ここは船の上ですよね…私は彼らをどこに案内したのでしょう？」

languages.text: “我……不记得了？这太奇怪了……就好像我同时在两个地方……不过……我记得，很久以前，有位帝国卫队的士兵拜访了我，好像是在沼泽魔鬼袭击之后。他治好了我的伤……还对我的脸做了什么……他说，他的战友们会来做他们该做的事情。等剩下的人到了之后，他们要我告诉他们魔鬼的巢穴在什么地方……可我们明明是在船上……我到底把他们带到了什么地方？”
languages.original_text: "I... don't remember? It's so strange... It's like I'm here and I'm there at the same time... But... I remember, many watches ago, a visit from a Guardsman, after the swamp devils attacked, it seemed. He treated my injuries... did something to my face... and said that his comrades would come and do what they had to do. And when the rest of them came, they told me to show them the way to the nest... but we're on the ship... where did I take them?"

traits.locale_text: “我……不记得了？这太奇怪了……就好像我同时在两个地方……不过……我记得，很久以前，有位帝国卫队的士兵拜访了我，好像是在沼泽魔鬼袭击之后。他治好了我的伤……还对我的脸做了什么……他说，他的战友们会来做他们该做的事情。等剩下的人到了之后，他们要我告诉他们魔鬼的巢穴在什么地方……可我们明明是在船上……我到底把他们带到了什么地方？”

languages.text: «No... ¿No recuerdo? Es raro... Es como si estuviera aquí y allí al mismo tiempo... pero... recuerdo que hace muchas guardias me visitó un soldado de la Guardia Imperial. Fue tras el ataque de los diablos del pantano. Trató mis heridas... me hizo algo en la cara... y dijo que sus camaradas vendrían a hacer lo necesario. Cuando los demás vinieron, me pidieron que les enseñara el camino al nido... pero estamos en la nave... ¿adónde los llevé?».
languages.original_text: "I... don't remember? It's so strange... It's like I'm here and I'm there at the same time... But... I remember, many watches ago, a visit from a Guardsman, after the swamp devils attacked, it seemed. He treated my injuries... did something to my face... and said that his comrades would come and do what they had to do. And when the rest of them came, they told me to show them the way to the nest... but we're on the ship... where did I take them?"

traits.locale_text: «No... ¿No recuerdo? Es raro... Es como si estuviera aquí y allí al mismo tiempo... pero... recuerdo que hace muchas guardias me visitó un soldado de la Guardia Imperial. Fue tras el ataque de los diablos del pantano. Trató mis heridas... me hizo algo en la cara... y dijo que sus camaradas vendrían a hacer lo necesario. Cuando los demás vinieron, me pidieron que les enseñara el camino al nido... pero estamos en la nave... ¿adónde los llevé?».

languages.text: « Je... Je ne sais plus ? C'est très étrange... comme si j'étais ici et ailleurs à la fois... Mais... je me souviens, il y a déjà plusieurs quarts de ça, d'avoir reçu la visite d'un garde impérial. Après l'attaque des démons des marais, il me semble. Il a soigné mes blessures... fait quelque chose à mon visage... et dit que ses confrères viendraient faire le nécessaire. Quand les autres sont arrivés, ils m'ont demandé de les conduire au nid... Mais nous sommes sur un vaisseau... Où les ai-je emmenés ? »
languages.original_text: "I... don't remember? It's so strange... It's like I'm here and I'm there at the same time... But... I remember, many watches ago, a visit from a Guardsman, after the swamp devils attacked, it seemed. He treated my injuries... did something to my face... and said that his comrades would come and do what they had to do. And when the rest of them came, they told me to show them the way to the nest... but we're on the ship... where did I take them?"

traits.locale_text: « Je... Je ne sais plus ? C'est très étrange... comme si j'étais ici et ailleurs à la fois... Mais... je me souviens, il y a déjà plusieurs quarts de ça, d'avoir reçu la visite d'un garde impérial. Après l'attaque des démons des marais, il me semble. Il a soigné mes blessures... fait quelque chose à mon visage... et dit que ses confrères viendraient faire le nécessaire. Quand les autres sont arrivés, ils m'ont demandé de les conduire au nid... Mais nous sommes sur un vaisseau... Où les ai-je emmenés ? »

languages.text: "Ich ... erinnere mich nicht? Es ist so seltsam ... Es ist, als wäre ich gleichzeitig hier und dort ... Aber ... ich weiß noch, wie mich vor vielen Schichten ein Soldat besucht hat, anscheinend nach dem Angriff der Sumpfteufel. Er hat meine Wunden behandelt ... etwas mit meinem Gesicht gemacht ... und gesagt, seine Kameraden würden kommen und tun, was getan werden muss. Und als der Rest von ihnen kam, sollte ich ihnen den Weg zum Nest zeigen ... aber wir sind auf dem Schiff ... wohin habe ich sie gebracht?"
languages.original_text: "I... don't remember? It's so strange... It's like I'm here and I'm there at the same time... But... I remember, many watches ago, a visit from a Guardsman, after the swamp devils attacked, it seemed. He treated my injuries... did something to my face... and said that his comrades would come and do what they had to do. And when the rest of them came, they told me to show them the way to the nest... but we're on the ship... where did I take them?"

Er hat meine Wunden behandelt ... etwas mit meinem Gesicht gemacht ... und gesagt, seine Kameraden würden kommen und tun, was getan werden muss. Und als der Rest von ihnen kam, sollte ich ihnen den Weg zum Nest zeigen ... aber wir sind auf dem Schiff ... wohin habe ich sie gebracht?"

languages.text: "Hatırlamıyorum. Çok tuhaf. Sanki aynı anda hem buradayım hem de orada. Ancak nöbetler önce, bataklık şeytanları saldırdıktan sonra bir muhafız yanıma gelmiş gibiydi. Yaralarımı tedavi etti, yüzüme bir şey yaptı ve yoldaşlarının gelip gerekeni yapacaklarını söyledi. Diğerleri de gelince bana yuvaya giden yolu göstermemi söylediler. Bizse şu an gemideyiz. Onları nereye götürdüm ki?"
languages.original_text: "I... don't remember? It's so strange... It's like I'm here and I'm there at the same time... But... I remember, many watches ago, a visit from a Guardsman, after the swamp devils attacked, it seemed. He treated my injuries... did something to my face... and said that his comrades would come and do what they had to do. And when the rest of them came, they told me to show them the way to the nest... but we're on the ship... where did I take them?"

traits.locale_text: "Hatırlamıyorum. Çok tuhaf. Sanki aynı anda hem buradayım hem de orada. Ancak nöbetler önce, bataklık şeytanları saldırdıktan sonra bir muhafız yanıma gelmiş gibiydi. Yaralarımı tedavi etti, yüzüme bir şey yaptı ve yoldaşlarının gelip gerekeni yapacaklarını söyledi. Diğerleri de gelince bana yuvaya giden yolu göstermemi söylediler. Bizse şu an gemideyiz. Onları nereye götürdüm ki?"
